## installAgentsHapps() function

Helper to install DNAs and create agents. Given an array of DNAs, a conductor is spawned, DNAs are installed, an agent is created and handles to the conductor, the cells and the agents are returned.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function installAgentsHapps(dnaUrl: string, options?: {
    logLevel: PlayerLogLevel;
}): Promise<{
    conductor: import("./conductor").Player;
    cellId: import("@holochain/client").CellId;
}>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dnaUrl | string | The URL of the DNA to install. |
|  options | { logLevel: [PlayerLogLevel](./tryorama.playerloglevel.md)<!-- -->; } | Options to set log level and other parameters. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;{ conductor: import("./conductor").[Player](./tryorama.player.md)<!-- -->; cellId: import("@holochain/client").CellId; }&gt;

Handles to the conductor instance and the created cells.
